numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The red percentage represents players of color.
2. The lighter red percentage represents head coaches of color.
3. The percentage of players of color in the Women's National Basketball Association is the same as the percentage of players of color in the National Basketball Association.
4. The number of players of color in Major League Baseball is less than the number of players of color in the other associations.
5. The National Basketball Association has the highest percentage of players of color.
6. The Women's National Basketball Association has the highest percentage of players of color.
7. Soccer seems to be the least diverse sport.
